message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll love. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $200 is my initial asking price, I understand it might be a bit high for you. How about we meet closer to the middle at $170?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
